/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a median, is filled with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The buildings on either side of the street are tall and modern, showcasing the architectural style of the city. The sky above is hazy, casting a soft light over the scene. The predominant colors in the image are blue, green, and gray, reflecting the urban landscape of Beijing.
